content:
{"name": "Milton Community Food Pantry/Parkway Methodist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The Milton Community Food Pantry cares deeply for our clients and volunteers. We want everyone to feel safe while fulfilling our mission to provide food to local residents in need.
 
The Pantry recently reopened to allow clients in to shop. Health and safety precautions are being strictly observed.
​

* Clients entering the Pantry will wear a mask at all times.
* Social distancing is being observed by clients and volunteers within the Pantry.
* A Pantry volunteer will shop with each client, and bag selected grocery items.
* No more than 3 clients at a time will be allowed inside the Pantry to shop.
* If you walk to the Pantry, we encourage you to bring a folding grocery cart to carry your food home.
* Please bring your reusable bags.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.miltonfoodpantryma.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "158 Blue Hills Parkway", "address_2": null, "city": "Milton", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02186", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.261537, "longitude": -71.0930614}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 696-0221", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}]}
